blogData.title: Merry Christmas!
blogData.description: As we close down 2021, we would like to wish everyone a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Thank you for your support this year!

data.richContent:
Merry Christmas! And we very much hope you have had a good year, and are looking forward to winding down for year-end.

Here at VideoTranslator, we have had a mixed year, probably like most people in 2021.

We Wish You And Yours A Merry Christmas

As I was writing this, the urge was to turn this into some kind of victory lap and talk about our wins and losses in 2021.

But that can always be another blog post.

So for this post, we just want to say we very much hope you had a good year.

It has been a challenging environment due to the lingering effects of the Covid-19 scare depending on where you are in the world.

But you/we/us have gotten through it and that is enough to be in good cheer.

Also, We Are Grateful

Mostly, in this post we’d like to say how grateful we are for all the support we have received this year, and we’d like to thank lots of people.

Given privacy considerations, we cannot name folks, but please be aware we are very grateful and thankful for the support, affection, and faith our clients and collaborators have shown, and the full team would like to thank you!

Thanks so much,

Tat Banerjee/Team VideoTranslator

nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: What Team VideoTranslator Did In 2021
nodes.description: 2021 was a bit of a complex year. As I'm sure it was for many of you. Read more to learn about how Team VideoTranslator navigated 2021.

nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Family’s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda
